SEARCH
Package src.repository

Interface OfficerRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
OfficerCsvMapper
public interface OfficerRepository
Repository interface for managing HDBOfficer

This interface provides abstraction over data operations such as loading, saving, and updating officers along with their project assignments. It supports reading from and writing to a CSV file

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<HDBOfficer>
    loadAll(List<Project> allProjects)
    Loads all HDB officers from the data source.
    void
    saveAll(List<HDBOfficer> officers)
    Persists the given list of HDB officers to the data source, replacing any existing data.
    void
    updateOfficer(HDBOfficer updatedOfficer)
    Updates a specific officer in the data source based on their NRIC.

  • Method Details

    • loadAll

      List<HDBOfficer> loadAll(List<Project> allProjects)
      Loads all HDB officers from the data source.
      Parameters:
      allProjects - A list of all known projects to match officer assignments.
      Returns:
      A list of HDBOfficer objects.

    • saveAll

      void saveAll(List<HDBOfficer> officers)
      Persists the given list of HDB officers to the data source, replacing any existing data.
      Parameters:
      officers - List of HDBOfficer to be saved.

    • updateOfficer

      void updateOfficer(HDBOfficer updatedOfficer)
      Updates a specific officer in the data source based on their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      updatedOfficer - The HDBOfficer object with updated fields.
